item.title: Lewis Pullman's 10 Best Movies & TV Shows, Ranked
item.description: Stepping out of his father's shadow, Lewis Pullman is putting together an array of stellar performances in acclaimed films and TV series.

item.title: Fight Club Ending Explained (In Detail)
item.description: Fight Club ends with one of cinema's most iconic twists, but even decades later, there's more to the somewhat ambiguous ending than meets the eye.

item.title: 10 Perfect DCU Roles For Tyler Hoechlin After Playing Superman In Superman & Lois (Including His DC Dream Role)
item.description: Superman & Lois might be ending, but Clark Kent actor Tyler Hoechlin could jump over to the DCU, and he has a dream role to play, among other options.
